sqls.sql: SELECT tools_status, tools_no, tools_name, tools_type1, tools_type2, tools_type3, tools_type4, tools_type5, tools_type6, tools_type7, tools_type8, tools_type9, tools_type10, factory_no, tools_sort, tools_color, tools_height, tools_total_qty, tools_valid_qty, tools_unit, tools_eff_n, tools_eff_d, tools_lifetime_hope, tools_lifetime_start, tools_lifetime_add, tools_lifetime_real, tools_lifetime_used, tools_used_status_id, tools_cycle_lifetime_used, tools_cycle_days_warning, tools_cycle_lifetime_warning, tools_cycle_days_maintain, tools_cycle_lifetime_maintain, tools_lifetime_add_cfm_time, tools_lifetime_add_cfm_worker, tools_maintain_date_last, tools_maintain_date_next, tools_mtr_rate, wkt_before_c, wkt_after_c, wkt_produce_c, qty_produce_c, wkt_worker_c, wkc_worker_num_c, wkt_before_b, wkt_after_b, wkt_produce_b, qty_produce_b, wkt_worker_b, wkc_worker_num_b, wkt_before_a, wkt_after_a, wkt_produce_a, qty_produce_a, wkt_worker_a, wkc_worker_num_a, wkt_max_wait_minute, cost_produce_c, cost_before_c, cost_after_c, cost_idle_c, tools_spec1_txt, tools_spec1_min, tools_spec1_max, tools_spec2_txt, tools_spec2_min, tools_spec2_max, tools_spec3_txt, tools_spec3_min, tools_spec3_max, tools_spec4_txt, tools_spec4_min, tools_spec4_max, tools_rmk01, tools_rmk02, tools_rmk03, tools_rmk04, tools_rmk05, tools_rmk06, tools_rmk07, tools_rmk08, tools_rmk09, tools_rmk10, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host, invp_no FROM pd_tools WHERE tools_id = @tools_id;
